column5: Where to buy Nils master hand auger in Ontario? They seem to be hard to come by.
Oops sorry...I was on the Cabela's site.
Ya I found them on Cabelas site but with the shipping and duties I figured I could drive to just about anywhere in ON and still some out ahead.
Call Angling Outfitters 519-539-5494 I think they have or are getting them in. If not they may know where to track them down.

I'd call Joss at Angling Outfitters in Woodstock and reserve one.  They don't last long in there and sell out fairly quick.  I've got a 4.5" I bought from there 3 yrs ago.  Best investment I've made so far.  Now I need a bigger one with Nippissing right on my doorstep.  It might be hard squeezing the walleye and pike through a 4.5" hole.
